basisSet.dc:title: 6-311++G(2d,2p)
basisSet.dct:abstract: VTZ2PD Valence Triple Zeta + Double Polar. + Diffuse on All Atoms
basisSet.dc:description:
6-311++G(2d,2p) Valence Triple Zeta + Polarization + Diffuse Basis ------------------------------------------------------------------- Elements Contraction Reference H: (6s,2p) -> [4s,2p] R. Krishnan, J.S. Binkley, R. Seeger and He: (5s,2p) -> [3s,2p] J.A. Pople, J. Chem. Phys. 72, 650 (1980). Li - Ne: (12s,6p,2d) -> [5s,4p,2d] K - Ca: (14s,11p,5d)-> [8s,7p,3d] J-P. Blaudeau, M. P. McGrath, L.A. Curtiss and L. Radom, J. Chem. Phys. 107, 5016 (1997).
Diffuse exponents: T. Clark, J. Chandrasekhar, P.v.R. Schleyer, J. Comp. Chem. 4, 294 (1983).
This basis contains two sets of polarization functions on every atom. Note: This basis set uses 5-component d functions.
